thread.title: This Instagram makeup artist creates insanely cool eye looks inspired by popular paintings
thread.title_full: This Instagram makeup artist creates insanely cool eye looks inspired by popular paintings

author: Amanda Grace
title: This Instagram makeup artist creates insanely cool eye looks inspired by popular paintings
text:
This Instagram makeup artist creates insanely cool eye looks inspired by popular paintings If Twitter and Facebook are the modern digital equivalents to the newspaper, Instagram is definitely the modern digital art gallery. This is true for classic artists and makeup artists alike, and one artist, in particular, is combining the two in the coolest way. Self-taught Instagram makeup artist Stefania has recreated artwork by Vincent van Gogh and Hokusai. Her talent is insanely impressive considering the London-based artist is only 16 years old! Stefania recently started a Youtube channel and we are hoping she uploads some step by step videos and new re-creations !
Stefania uses a combo of low-cost and luxe products for her eye look masterpieces , combining products from cosmetic companies such as NYX and Anastasia Beverly Hills.
Take a look at some of her work!
VINCENT VAN GOGH's STARRY NIGHT USING @nyxcosmetics @nyxcosmetics_uk VIVID BRIGHTS LINERS IN "sapphire" "halo" "delight" "violet" AND NORMAL LIQUID LINERS IN BLACK N WHITE #makeup #likeforlike #followforfollow #abhjunkies #morphebrushes #morphe #ivysbeautyroom #anastasiabeverlyhills #bretmansvanity #wakeupandmakeup #allmodernmakeup #hypnaughtymakeup #nyxcosmetics #nyxcosmetics_UK #undiscovered_muas 
A photo posted by stefania (@stefaniabeauty) on Dec 30, 2016 at 6:58pm PST 
She recently conquered another Van Gogh-inspired piece, Almond Blossom ! Vincent Van Gogh's "Almond Blossom" USING @nyxcosmetics @nyxcosmetics_uk VIVID BRIGHTS LINERS IN "fire" "halo" "envy" "delight" and using their normal black and white liquid liners. Also used the nyx frostbite shadow for the highlight Brows are @anastasiabeverlyhills dipbrow pomade in dark brown #beauty #makeup #likeforlike #followforfollow #abhjunkies #morphebrushes #morphe #ivysbeautyroom #anastasiabeverlyhills #bretmansvanity #wakeupandmakeup #allmodernmakeup #hypnaughtymakeup #nyxcosmetics #nyxcosmetics_UK 
A photo posted by stefania (@stefaniabeauty) on Jan 2, 2017 at 5:37pm PST 
A brilliant rendition of Hokusai’s famous Japanese piece, The Wave … The Wave by Hokusai USING @nyxcosmetics @nyxcosmetics_uk VIVID BRIGHTS LINERS IN "sapphire" and "delight" and using their normal black and white liquid liners #makeup #likeforlike #followforfollow #abhjunkies #morphebrushes #morphe #ivysbeautyroom #anastasiabeverlyhills #bretmansvanity #wakeupandmakeup #allmodernmakeup #hypnaughtymakeup #nyxcosmetics #nyxcosmetics_UK 
A photo posted by stefania (@stefaniabeauty) on Jan 2, 2017 at 1:50pm PST 
We can not believe Instagram makeup artist Stefania has only been on the site a little less than a year. peacock inspired look to once again continue the animal trend (this isn't my fave but was told to post it so enjoy) || @nyxcosmetics @nyxcosmetics_uk vivid brights liners in vivid envy, delight, petal, violet, halo, sapphire as well as the glam pink rose glamour liner || @katvondbeauty tattoo liner in the shade "trooper || @eylureofficial exaggerate lashes || @anastasiabeverlyhills dipbrowpomade in dark brown @abhjunkies #abhjunkies || I used the @nyxcosmetics vivid brights vivid sapphire liner as bottom lash "mascara" || highlight is the @nyxcosmetics_uk frostbite shadow || #makeup #beauty #likeforlike #followforfollow #bretmansvanity #wakeupandmakeup #ivysbeautyroom #morphe #morphebrushes #katvond #anastasiabeverlyhills #abh #eyebrows #eyeshadow #eyeliner #peacock #inspiration #eyeshadowtutorial 
A photo posted by stefania (@stefaniabeauty) on Dec 29, 2016 at 10:30am PST 
We can’t wait to see what she creates next!
